## txBusy() function

This returns true if transmissions of the specified kind are active on the GPIO or group.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function txBusy(handle: number, gpio: number, kind: TxKind): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The GPIO device handle as returned by [gpiochipOpen()](./lgpio.gpiochipopen.md) |
|  gpio | number | The number of the GPIO or group leader to check |
|  kind | [TxKind](./lgpio.txkind.md) | The transmission type to check |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if a transmission is active, false otherwise
